```{r}
set.seed(45L)
DT <- data.table(V1 = c(1L,2L),
                 V2 = LETTERS[1:3],
                 V3 = round(rnorm(4),4),
                 V4 = 1:12)
```


```{r}
DT
```



```{r}
typeof(DT)
```

```{r}
class(DT)
```





## Subsetting Rows Using i

```{r}
DT[3:5,]
```



```{r}
DT[3:5]
```

```{r}
DT[V2=="A"]
```


```{r}
DT[V2 %in% c("A","C")]
```


## Manipulating on Columns in j

sonuç vektör olarak alınacaksa sadece sütun ismi yazılıyor

```{r}
DT[,V2]
```

sonuç data.frame olarak alınacaksa sütun ismi önünde `.` yazılıyor

```{r}
DT[,.(V2)]
```



```{r}
DT[,.(V2,V3)]
```

tek sütun üzerinden özet alma

```{r}
DT[,sum(V1)]
```

birden fazla sütun üzerinden özet alma

```{r}
DT[,.(sum(V1),sd(V3))]
```

```{r}
DT[,.(Aggregate = sum(V1),
      Sd.V3 = sd(V3))]
```

```{r}
DT[,.(V1,Sd.V3=sd(V3))]
```

```{r}
DT[,.(print(V2),
      plot(V3),
      NULL)]
```


## Doing j by Group

```{r}
DT[,.(V4.Sum = sum(V4)),by = V1]
```


```{r}
DT[,.(V4.Sum = sum(V4)),
   by = .(V1,V2)]
```




```{r}
DT[,.(V4.Sum = sum(V4)),
   by = sign(V1-1)]
```



```{r}
DT[,.(V4.Sum = sum(V4)),
   by = .(V1.01 = sign(V1 - 1))]
```


```{r}
DT[1:5,.(V4.Sum = sum(V4)), 
   by = V1]
```

```{r}
DT[,.N,by = V1]
```
